alert.note: Alert for Foard; Hardeman; Knox (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 23 at 10:25PM CDT until May 23 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR FOARD...NORTHWESTERN KNOX AND SOUTHWESTERN HARDEMAN COUNTIES... At 1023 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Goodlett to 5 miles northwest of Crowell to 9 miles west of Truscott, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet. At 1012 PM CDT, the Hackberry Mesonet gusted to 70 mph. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Quanah, Crowell, Margaret, Goodlett, Truscott, Copper Breaks State Park, and Lazare. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
